title: Ukraine Invasion Dashes U.S. Banks’ Russia Hopes
sub_head: Goldman, JPMorgan, Citigroup leaving Russia or thinking about it—but getting out won’t be easy
body:
Wall Street banks are backing away from a country they had once hoped to help bring into the Western financial system.
Two weeks into the Kremlin’s invasion of Ukraine, U.S. banks are following a slew of multinational companies that have announced plans to stop doing business in Russia.
